pageContent: Purpose: Active surveillance to manage prostate cancer provides an alternative to immediate treatment in men with low risk prostate cancer. We report updated outcomes from a long-standing active surveillance cohort and factors associated with reclassification.

metaData.source:
[Epidemiology, diagnosis and prognosis of localized prostate cancer: what's new?]
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/19465334/
